title.en: Since or For (Desde o Desde hace)
title.es: Since or For (Desde o Desde hace)

description.en: Learn when to use 'since' for specific points in time and 'for' for periods of time. Practice with Present Perfect and Present Perfect Continuous tenses.
description.es: Aprende cuándo usar 'since' para puntos específicos en el tiempo y 'for' para períodos de tiempo. Practica con Present Perfect y Present Perfect Continuous.

prompt.en: I've lived in Spain since 1999.
prompt.es: Vivo en España desde 1999.

exercises.solution: I've lived in Spain since 1999.

tip.en: Use 'since' with specific points in time (dates, days, months, years). 'Since' = desde (a specific moment). We use Present Perfect when we started something in the past and continue until now.
tip.es: Usa 'since' con puntos específicos en el tiempo (fechas, días, meses, años). 'Since' = desde (un momento específico). Usamos Present Perfect cuando empezamos algo en el pasado y continúa hasta ahora.

prompt.en: I've worked in this company since March.
prompt.es: Trabajo en esta empresa desde marzo.

exercises.solution: I've worked in this company since March.

tip.en: Use 'since' with specific points in time (dates, days, months, years). 'Since' = desde (a specific moment). We use Present Perfect when we started something in the past and continue until now.
tip.es: Usa 'since' con puntos específicos en el tiempo (fechas, días, meses, años). 'Since' = desde (un momento específico). Usamos Present Perfect cuando empezamos algo en el pasado y continúa hasta ahora.

prompt.en: I've known her since 1989.
prompt.es: La conozco desde 1989.

exercises.solution: I've known her since 1989.

tip.en: Use 'since' with specific points in time (dates, days, months, years). 'Since' = desde (a specific moment). We use Present Perfect when we started something in the past and continue until now.
tip.es: Usa 'since' con puntos específicos en el tiempo (fechas, días, meses, años). 'Since' = desde (un momento específico). Usamos Present Perfect cuando empezamos algo en el pasado y continúa hasta ahora.

prompt.en: England hasn't won the World Cup since 1966.
prompt.es: Inglaterra no gana el mundial desde 1966.

exercises.solution: England hasn't won the World Cup since 1966.

tip.en: Use 'since' with specific points in time (dates, days, months, years). 'Since' = desde (a specific moment). We use Present Perfect when we started something in the past and continue until now.
tip.es: Usa 'since' con puntos específicos en el tiempo (fechas, días, meses, años). 'Since' = desde (un momento específico). Usamos Present Perfect cuando empezamos algo en el pasado y continúa hasta ahora.

prompt.en: She hasn't worked since last week.
prompt.es: Ella no trabaja desde la semana pasada.

exercises.solution: She hasn't worked since last week.

tip.en: Use 'since' with specific points in time (dates, days, months, years). 'Since' = desde (a specific moment). We use Present Perfect when we started something in the past and continue until now.
tip.es: Usa 'since' con puntos específicos en el tiempo (fechas, días, meses, años). 'Since' = desde (un momento específico). Usamos Present Perfect cuando empezamos algo en el pasado y continúa hasta ahora.

prompt.en: My computer hasn't been working since Tuesday.
prompt.es: Mi ordenador no funciona desde el martes.

exercises.solution: My computer hasn't been working since Tuesday.

tip.en: Use Present Perfect Continuous for ongoing actions or states that started at a specific time. 'Since' + specific point in time (Tuesday).
tip.es: Usa Present Perfect Continuous para acciones o estados continuos que empezaron en un momento específico. 'Since' + punto específico en el tiempo (martes).

prompt.en: I've been working since first thing this morning.
prompt.es: Llevo desde primera hora de la mañana trabajando.

exercises.solution: I've been working since first thing this morning.

tip.en: Use Present Perfect Continuous for ongoing actions or states that started at a specific time. 'Since' + specific point in time (this morning).
tip.es: Usa Present Perfect Continuous para acciones o estados continuos que empezaron en un momento específico. 'Since' + punto específico en el tiempo (esta mañana).

prompt.en: I've been trying to speak to her since Monday.
prompt.es: Llevo desde el lunes intentando hablar con ella.

exercises.solution: I've been trying to speak to her since Monday.

tip.en: Use Present Perfect Continuous for ongoing actions or states that started at a specific time. 'Since' + specific point in time (Monday).
tip.es: Usa Present Perfect Continuous para acciones o estados continuos que empezaron en un momento específico. 'Since' + punto específico en el tiempo (lunes).

prompt.en: I've been playing the lottery since I came to Spain.
prompt.es: Juego a la lotería desde que vine a España.

exercises.solution: I've been playing the lottery since I came to Spain.

tip.en: Use Present Perfect Continuous for ongoing actions or states that started at a specific time. 'Since' can also be followed by a clause (since I came...).
tip.es: Usa Present Perfect Continuous para acciones o estados continuos que empezaron en un momento específico. 'Since' también puede ir seguido de una cláusula (since I came...).

prompt.en: I've been drinking wine since 2002.
prompt.es: Bebo vino desde 2002.

exercises.solution: I've been drinking wine since 2002.

tip.en: Use Present Perfect Continuous for ongoing actions or states that started at a specific time. 'Since' + specific point in time (2002).
tip.es: Usa Present Perfect Continuous para acciones o estados continuos que empezaron en un momento específico. 'Since' + punto específico en el tiempo (2002).

prompt.en: I've lived in Spain for three years.
prompt.es: Vivo en España desde hace tres años.

exercises.solution: I've lived in Spain for three years.

tip.en: Use 'for' with periods of time (minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, years). 'For' = desde hace (a duration). We use Present Perfect for actions that started in the past and continue now.
tip.es: Usa 'for' con períodos de tiempo (minutos, horas, días, semanas, meses, años). 'For' = desde hace (una duración). Usamos Present Perfect para acciones que empezaron en el pasado y continúan ahora.

prompt.en: I've worked in this company for four months.
prompt.es: Trabajo en esta empresa desde hace cuatro meses.

exercises.solution: I've worked in this company for four months.

tip.en: Use 'for' with periods of time (minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, years). 'For' = desde hace (a duration). We use Present Perfect for actions that started in the past and continue now.
tip.es: Usa 'for' con períodos de tiempo (minutos, horas, días, semanas, meses, años). 'For' = desde hace (una duración). Usamos Present Perfect para acciones que empezaron en el pasado y continúan ahora.

tip.en: Use 'for' with periods of time (minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, years). 'For' = desde hace (a duration). We use Present Perfect for actions that started in the past and continue now.

tip.en: Use Present Perfect Continuous for ongoing actions or states that have lasted for a period of time. 'For' + duration (two weeks).
tip.es: Usa Present Perfect Continuous para acciones o estados continuos que han durado por un período de tiempo. 'For' + duración (dos semanas).
